member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_QUERY_INDEX
member.summary: TheACTIVATION_CONTEXT_QUERY_INDEX structure is used by function.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_QUERY_INDEX.ulAssemblyIndex
member.summary: One-based index of the assembly whose file table is to be queried.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_QUERY_INDEX.ulFileIndexInAssembly
member.summary: Zero-based index of the file in the above assembly to be queried.
